content:
I'd like to update WR with a new release that actually works as it should.
To do this we need to stamp out a few bugs and regressions:

  1. Bug New Install - Default WRConfiguration.xml not loaded - Custom configs are overwritten - all builds #338 I've confirmed this.
  2. Bug Last Export route - last point location problem reported #358 David noted this, but Needs verification
  3. Bug Which Data is being used? #361 I've confirmed this , but it Needs verification.

Rick Gleason said:

I'd like to update WR with a new release that actually works as it should.
To do this we need to stamp out a few bugs and regressions:

  1. Bug New Install - Default WRConfiguration.xml not loaded - Custom configs are overwritten - all builds #338 I've confirmed this.
  2. Bug Last Export route - last point location problem reported #358 David noted this, but Needs verification
  3. Bug Which Data is being used? #361 I've confirmed this , but it Needs verification.

Thanks Rick. I might have some time this week to look at some of this. I'll keep the issues in github updated to indicate when I'm working on any of them, and with any progress made.

Thanks Sebastien, for fixing 1 and 3.
Should we put this excellent documentation about startup and the Sample Configs somewhere?
https://github.com/rgleason/weather_routing_pi/issues/338#issuecomment-2874364927

Also I see that there is a fix for David's Issue number 2 above.

So I will increment the version and publish now.
Thank you!

So David can test and close that one.

Hakan has just pushed an update to the po internationalization file. I have accepted his PR into the Master.
https://github.com/rgleason/weather_routing_pi

These files should also be added to api118 branch, and I will make a PR from master and maybe merge it.
Actually there are conflicts.
